name: Ext_R5_Procedure_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Procedure.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Procedure.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Procedure|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The justification that the procedure was performed
element.definition: The coded reason or reference why the procedure was performed. This may be a coded entity of some type, be present as text, or be a reference to one of several resources that justify the procedure.
element.comment: `Procedure.reason` maps to R4B `Procedure.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Procedure.reason` maps to R4B `Procedure.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Procedure.reason` maps to R4B `Procedure.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The justification that the procedure was performed

element.comment: `Procedure.reason` maps to R4B `Procedure.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Procedure.reason` maps to R4B `Procedure.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Procedure.reason` maps to R4B `Procedure.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A code that identifies the reason a procedure is  required.
